annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Form of notification of negative result
annotations.translation: 阴性结果通知表格

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. Notification of a negative test result must include, in English, French or Spanish, the following information
annotations.translation: 2. 检测结果呈阴性的通知必须以英语、法语或西班牙语包含以下信息

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Persons not required to comply with regulation 4
annotations.translation: 无需遵守第4条的人员

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. (1) The persons referred to in regulation 4(6)(c) (and not required to comply with that regulation) are
annotations.translation: 3. (1)  第4 (6) (c) 条提及的人（无需遵守该条例）是

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) a sensitivity of at least 80%,
annotations.translation: (i) 灵敏度至少为 80%，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) a specificity of at least 97%, and
annotations.translation: (ii) 特异性至少为 97%，以及

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) a limit of detection of less than or equal to 100,000 SARS-CoV-2 copies per millilitre;
annotations.translation: (iii) 每毫升低于或等于 100,000 SARS-CoV-2 病毒的检测极限；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) it is not a test provided or administered under the National Health Service Act 2006, the National Health Services (Wales) Act 2006, the National Health Service (Scotland) Act 1978, or the Health and Personal Social Services (Northern Ireland) Order 1972; and
annotations.translation: (b) 它不是根据2006年《国家卫生服务法》、2006年《国家卫生服务（威尔士）法》、1978年《国家卫生服务（苏格兰）法》或1972年《卫生和个人社会服务（北爱尔兰）令》提供的或管理的测试；以及

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) the test sample is taken from the person no more than three days before
annotations.translation: (c) 测试样本是在不超过三天前从该人身上采集的

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) in the case of that person travelling to England on a commercial transport service, the service's scheduled time of departure, or
annotations.translation: (i)  如果该人乘坐商业运输服务前往英国，则该服务的预定出发时间，或

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) in any other case, the actual time of departure of the vessel or aircraft on which that person is travelling to England.
annotations.translation: (ii) 在任何其他情况下，该人前往英格兰的船只或飞机的实际出发时间。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) the name of the person from whom the sample was taken;
annotations.translation: (a) 取样人的姓名；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) that person's date of birth or age;
annotations.translation: (b) 其出生日期或年龄；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) the negative result of the test;
annotations.translation: (c) 检测结果呈阴性；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (d) the date the test sample was collected or received by the test provider;
annotations.translation: (d) 试验供应商收集或收到试验样品的日期；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (e) the name of the test provider and information sufficient to contact that provider;
annotations.translation: (e) 测试提供商的名称以及足以联系该提供商的信息；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (f) a statement
annotations.translation: (f) 声明

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) that the test was a polymerase chain reaction test, or
annotations.translation: (i) 该测试是聚合酶链反应测试，或者

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) of the name of the device that was used for the test.
annotations.translation: (ii) 试验所用设备的名称。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) a person ("P") described in
annotations.translation: (a) 所述的人（“P”）

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) paragraph 16 (1) (b) of Schedule 4 where, prior to P's departure to the United Kingdom, the relevant Department has certified that they meet this description and are not required to comply with regulation 4, or
annotations.translation: (i) 附表4第16 (1) (b)段，如果在P离开英国之前，相关部门已证明他们符合本说明，并且不需要遵守第4条，或

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) paragraph 17 of Schedule 4 where, prior to P's departure to the United Kingdom, the relevant Department has also certified that they are not required to comply with regulation 4;
annotations.translation: (ii) 附表 4 第 17 段，在 P 出发前往英国之前，相关部门也已证明他们无需遵守第 4 条；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) a Crown servant or government contractor ("C") who is required to undertake essential policing or essential government work in the United Kingdom or is returning from conducting such work outside the United Kingdom where, prior to C's departure to the United Kingdom, the relevant Department has certified that they meet this description and are not required to comply with regulation 4;
annotations.translation: (b) 一名Crown公务员或政府承包商（“C”），被要求在英国从事必要的警务或基本的政府工作，或者从联合王国境外从事此类工作返回，在C离开英国之前，有关部门已证明他们符合这一描述，并且不需要遵守条例4;

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) a representative (“R”) of a foreign country or territory, or of the government of a British overseas territory, travelling to the United Kingdom to conduct official business with the United Kingdom where, prior to R's departure to the United Kingdom
annotations.translation: (c) 外国或领地或英国海外领地政府的代表(“R”)，在R前往英国之前前往英国与英国进行公务来往

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) the relevant head of the mission, consular post, or office representing a foreign territory in the United Kingdom, or a Governor of a British overseas territory (as the case may be), or a person acting on their authority, confirms in writing to the Foreign Commonwealth and Development Office that R is required to undertake work which is essential to the foreign country represented by the mission or consular post, the foreign territory represented by the office or the British overseas territory, and
annotations.translation: (i) 驻英国使团，领馆或代表外国领地的办事处的有关领导，或英国海外领地的总督（视情况而定），或经其授权行事的人，以书面形式向外交，联邦及发展办事处确认，R须从事对该使团或领馆所代表的外国，办事处所代表的外国领地或英国海外领地至为重要的工作，以及
